1.name: Task Group
1.description: Increase self Aviation by 5 (15%). When used as flagship, increase allied Eagle Union Battleship Firepower by 5% (15%). When not used as a flagship, increase Eagle Union Destroyer Firepower and Anti-Air by 5% (15%)

2.name: Indomitable Perseverance
2.description:
When there are no CV/CVL in the allied fleet, increase allied main fleet Anti-Air by 4.5% (12%). After launching an airstrike, launch an Aviation Barrage:
 ★Fighter: 2x100lb (121 DMG) 120% Efficiency
 ★Dive Bomber: 1x2000lb (456 DMG) + 2x100lb (121 DMG) 120% Efficiency
 ★Torpedo Bomber: 3x Air Torpedo (240 DMG) 100% Efficiency
When there is only one CV/CVL, only launches a Fighter. When there are two CV/CVL, launches a Fighter and a Dive Bomber. When there are three CV/CVL, launches a Fighter, a Dive Bomber and a Torpedo Bomber.

limitBreak.tier1: Number of Fighters +1, All Plane Efficiency +3%
limitBreak.tier2: Hangar Capacity +1, Number of Dive Bombers +1, All Plane Efficiency +5%
limitBreak.tier3: Number of All Planes +1, All Plane Efficiency +7%

1.chinese: 埃塞克斯级航空母舰—邦克山，舷号CV-17
1.chineseTL: Essex Class Carrier - Bunker Hill, Hull Number CV-17
1.japanese: エセックス級航空母艦・バンカー・ヒル（CV-17)

2.chinese: 埃塞克斯级邦克山号，名字源于独立战争中那场残酷的战斗。曾经活跃于诸多战场，不过…战争让人感受到的，只能是悲伤和痛苦，无需多言
2.chineseTL: Essex Class, Bunker Hill. I was named after that harsh battle for independence. I was active in many battles, but... the things that war makes one feel, could only be sadness and pain, there's nothing else that needs to be said.
2.japanese: エセックス級のバンカー・ヒルだ。名はかの独立戦争の戦場から来ている。活躍した戦闘は多いが…悲しみと痛みをもたらす戦争のことだ。多くは語るまい
2.japaneseTL: I'm Bunker Hill of the Essex-class. I'm named after that battlefield of the Revolutionary War. I've participated in many battles but... it was a war that brought about sadness and pain. I won't talk much about it.

3.chinese: 邦克山，埃塞克斯级的一员，从今以后将加入舰队，听从你的号令。放心，会有机会见识到我的实力的。
3.chineseTL: Bunker Hill, a member of the Essex Class. From now on I will be part of the fleet, and will listen to your commands. Be at ease, you will have the chance to see my abilities.
3.japanese: エセックス級の一人、このバンカー・ヒルが艦隊に加わり、お前の指揮下に入った。案ずるな、じきにお前も私の実力を目にすることになるだろう
3.japaneseTL: As one of the Essex-class, this Bunker Hill is joining the fleet under your command. Fear not, for you too will soon witness my true strength.

4.chinese: 现在可是非常时期，及时试假日也要做好出假日特快（Holiday Express）的准备。
4.chineseTL: It is the busy period right now, even if it's the holidays now you will have to make preparations for the "Holiday Express".
4.japanese: 今は非常時だ。休日でも「ホリデーエクスプレス」の覚悟をしてくれたまえ
4.japaneseTL: Now is a time of crisis. Even during days off, please be prepared for the "Holiday Express"

5.chinese: 指挥官，为什么盯着我看......
5.chineseTL: Commander, why are you staring at me.....
5.japanese: 指揮官、なぜこちらを見つめている……？
5.japaneseTL: Commander, why are you staring my way...?

6.chinese: 今天，又有哪里将会被战争的烈火席卷呢...？
6.chineseTL: Today, will there be any places being dragged into the flames of war...?
6.japanese: 今日もどこかでは、戦争の炎に巻き込まれているのだな
6.japaneseTL: I wonder if today too, some place will be swallowed by the flames of war.

7.chinese: 埃尔德里奇的能力？我不大清楚...不过隐隐约约好像在哪里见过的样子。
7.chineseTL: Eldridge's powers? I'm not very clear... but I vaguely remember seeing that before.
7.japanese: エルドリッジの能力？あまりよくわからないが……どこかで見たような……
7.japaneseTL: Eldridge's ability? Even though I don't understand it well...I feel like I've seen it somewhere...

8.chinese: 在埃塞克斯级的攻击编队面前，所有的抵抗都是徒劳的...
8.chineseTL: In the face of the attacking forces of the Essex Class, all resistance is futile.
8.japanese: エセックス級攻撃空母編隊の前で、抵抗など無意味だ
8.japaneseTL: Resistance is meaningless before the attack formation of the Essex-class.

9.chinese: 我没有生气，只是不擅长表达。所以，不用担心打扰到我，有什么事尽管来找我吧。
9.chineseTL: I am not angry, I am just not well versed in expressions. So, do not worry about disturbing me, if there are any issues, feel fre to find me.
9.japanese: ……沈黙は苛立ちを意味しているわけではない。用事があれば声をかけてくれ
9.japaneseTL: ...It's not like my silence is a sign of me being irritated. Call out to me if there's something to do.

10.chinese: 看来…指挥官需要一点记忆深刻的教训啊？
10.chineseTL: Looks like... Commander needs some punishment that is memorable huh?
10.japanese: どうやら指揮官には記憶に残る「体験」が必要のようだな
10.japaneseTL: Seems like Commander is in need of a memorable "physical experience".

11.chineseTL: Missions... it's better to finish them early.
11.japanese: 任務…早くこなしたほうがいい
11.japaneseTL: Missions...It'd be good to finish them fast.

12.chinese: 回来了吗？那就...准备下一次出击吧。
12.chineseTL: Are you back? Then... let's prepare for the next sortie then.
12.japaneseTL: There's a lot of rewards? That's only natural.

13.chineseTL: Mail... will there be new intelligence?
13.japanese: メール…新しい情報はあるか？

14.chineseTL: There's lots of rewards? That is a certainty.
14.japanese: 戻ったか。……では、次の出撃の準備に入るか？
14.japaneseTL: You're back? ...then let us begin the preparations for the next sortie.

15.chinese: 失陪一下，我去迎接委托回来的同伴们，你在这等我消息就好了。
15.chineseTL: Please excuse me, I will welcome the comrades that has returned, you can just wait here for my news.
15.japanese: すまん、委託から戻ってきた子たちを出迎えてくる。お前はここで結果を待っていればいい
15.japaneseTL: Excuse me, I'll go welcome the girls who've returned from the commission. You should wait here for the results.

17.chinese: 为什么，要与我们为敌呢...
17.chineseTL: Why, are you becoming our enemies...
17.japanese: なぜ敵になるのを選んだか……！
17.japaneseTL: Why did you choose to be our enemies...!

18.chinese: 这就是你们所选择的的结局吗...
18.chineseTL: Is this the ending that you choose...?
18.japanese: お前たちが選んだ結末はこれか
18.japaneseTL: So this is the end you chose

19.chinese: 这是...堪比龙颚（dragon jaw）的强敌吗......！
19.chineseTL: This is... an enemy that that surpasses even that of the (dragon jaw)?
19.japanese: その力……「竜の顎（ドラゴンジョーズ）」をも凌ぐ強敵だというのか…！
19.japaneseTL: That power...an enemy formidable enough to endure "Dragon's Jaws"...!

22.chineseTL: I do not wish to speak with you now.
22.japaneseTL: I don't want to talk right now.

23.chinese: 战争中不存在美丽，只有丑陋而残酷的死亡和厮杀...
23.chineseTL: In war there does not exist beauty, there's only ugliness, harshness, death and murder...
23.japanese: 人間の戦争に美しさなど存在しない。傷つけ合い、殺し合いなど醜いものしか存在しないのだ
23.japaneseTL: There is no such thing as beauty in mankind's war. Only unsightly things like hurt and death exist.

24.chinese: ...当我面无表情保持沉默的时候，并不是在生气，只是单纯的在想事情，或者在想该怎么去表达所想的事情而已。
24.chineseTL: ... when I am quiet while expressionless, it is not that I am angry, I am just thinking about things, or I am thinking how to express what I am thinking about.
24.japanese: …沈黙は苛立ちを意味しているわけではない。考え込んでいる、もしくは考え込んだことをどうやって言い出すか、考え込んでしまっているだけだ
24.japaneseTL: ...It's not like my silence is a sign of me being irritated. I'm simply lost in thought, or pondering how to express the things I'm thinking about.

25.chinese: 最近思绪总会受到些莫名的干扰，想事情的时候，总会冒出某人的脸庞，让人难以冷静下来...
25.chineseTL: Recently my thoughts would get disrupted due to some reason, when I am thinking about things, there's always a certain individual's face that would come to mind, it makes one hard to calm down...
25.japanese: 最近、思考が妙によく阻害される気がする。考え込むと、ついつい誰かの顔が思い浮かび、冷静ではいられなくなる……
25.japaneseTL: Lately, I feel like my thoughts are disrupted by something weird. Whenever I get lost in thought, a certain someone's face would unintentionally come to mind, and I would lose my composure...

26.chinese: 原本以为，为战争而生的我们，除了战斗之外并无更多存在的价值。不过，与指挥官朝夕相处后的现在，我似乎...能感受到战争之外的生存意义了。
26.chineseTL: I originally thought, that us who were born of war, besides war wouldn't have any other value. But from the days that I spent with the Commander, I seem... to be able to feel the meaning of living aside from war.
26.japanese: 戦いのために生まれた私たちは、戦闘以外に存在価値などないと思った。お前との日々を過ごして、私たちには戦うこと以外にも生きる価値がある――そんな…気がする
26.japaneseTL: I thought that we, who had been born for war, had nothing to live for but the battlefield. But spending my days with you, I feel like... there's more to live for than just waging war.

27.chinese: 对不起，现在脑袋里只有一片空白。呃...这种时候该说什么好呢...对了！"对你的忠诚与爱将持续到永远"，这样如何？
27.chineseTL: I apologize, I have only a blank in my mind, ugh... what should I say at this time... Right! "My loyalty and love to you will last till eternity", how about this?
27.japanese: すまない…頭の中が真っ白だ。くっ、一体なにを言えば……そうだ！「お前への忠誠と愛は永遠に続くだろう」――これでいいか？
27.japaneseTL: I'm sorry...my mind is blank right now. Ugh, just what should I say... I got it! "My loyalty and love for you will surely continue for all eternity" - is this alright?

28.chinese: （埃塞克斯，香格里拉）在埃塞克斯级面前，你们毫无胜算。
28.chineseTL: (Sortie with Essex, Shangri-La) In front of (Fleet) Essex, you have no chance of victory.
28.japanese: エセックス級の前でお前たちは無力だ

29.chinese: （埃尔德里奇）彩虹计划？…感觉真不错……
29.chineseTL: (Sortie with Eldridge) Project Rainbow? ... That does feel great...
29.japanese: レインボープラン？…いい響きだな……
29.japaneseTL: Rainbow Plan? ...it's got a nice ring to it...
